---
imports:  import { Button, DialogsManager, dialogs } from "@sparrowengg/twigs-react";
---

```jsx live play=dialogs-manager-confirm
<div>
  <Button
    onClick={() => {
      dialogs.open("confirm", {
        title: "Are you sure you want to perform this action",
        content: "You can perform this action again.",
        labels: {
          confirm: "Yes, I am sure",
          cancel: "Cancel",
        },
        confirmButtonProps: {
          color: "error",
        },
      });
    }}
  >
    Open Dialog
  </Button>
  <DialogsManager />
</div>
```
